pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Home Assistant Intents PackagePackaging for [intents](https://github.com/home-assistant/intents/)## InstallClone the repo and create a virtual environment:``` shgit clone --recursive https://github.com/home-assistant/intents-packagecd intents-packagescript/setup```## PackageUpdate the submodule:``` shgit submodule update --remote```Bump the version in `pyproject.toml` to `YYYY.M.D` and commit changes.Generate dist:``` shscript/package```Upload `.tar.gz` and `.whl` in `dist/` to PyPI.
